mapper.select: select user_agent_browser, count(*) visit_count from VISIT_LOG group by user_agent_browser
SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(access_time), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS visitdate, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM visit_log GROUP BY TRUNC(access_time) ORDER BY visitdate
SELECT EXTRACT(HOUR FROM access_time) AS visithour, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM visit_log GROUP BY EXTRACT(HOUR FROM access_time) ORDER BY visithour
select P.* , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Product P ) AS productTotalCnt FROM Product P
